mapper.select: select arrange_id,arrange_content,arrange_place,arrange_date,arrange_time,arrange_if_prompt, arrange_if_prompt_date,arrange_if_prompt_time from Arrangement where user_id=#{user_id} order by arrange_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into Arrangement(user_id, arrange_content, arrange_place, arrange_date,arrange_time, arrange_if_prompt, arrange_if_prompt_date, arrange_if_prompt_time) values (#{user_id}, #{arrange_content}, #{arrange_place}, #{arrange_date},#{arrange_time}, #{arrange_if_prompt}, #{arrange_if_prompt_date}, #{arrange_if_prompt_time})
mapper.delete: delete from Arrangement where arrange_id = #{arrange_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
